articles.title: After Less Than a Year, Twitter is Retiring its Stories-Like 'Fleets' Option - Social Media Today
articles.description: The decision is a surprising move given Fleets has only been around for less than a year.
articles.content:
"'Twas here for but for a fleeting moment..."
In a surprising about turn, Twitter has announced that it's retiring Fleets, its own take on the Stories format, after less than a year of its existence… [+3847 chars]
